text: The family de l'Estoile (also spelled as l'Etoile, l'Estoille and Lestoille) was a French family, whose members were noted for their activities in the Safavid Empire (1501-1736). The first known member of the family that moved to Iran was Isaac Boutet de l'Estoille (died 28 July 1667, in New Julfa). He served king Abbas I (r. 1588-1629) as a goldsmith, amongst others. ==Notable members== * Isaac Boutet de l'Estoille (died 28 July 1667, New Julfa) * Louis- Guillherme de l'Estoile (died 16 June 1701, New Julfa) * Angela (died 1675) * André (died 1745, New Julfa) * Alexandre (died 1707, near Bandar Abbas) * Reine (died 1766) * Isaac de l'Estoille ==Sources== * * *
title: De l'Estoile family
